channel.title: Help me, pleasee!
channel.description:
i have this fucking virus on my computer that is fucking everything up.
i've read alot of shit on google, how to "fix it," but it doesn't work.
in my task bar, theres a little red ballon with a x through it, like if windows firewall is off.
it says "Secruity Center Alert, Your computer is infected!"
it keeps asking me to download a registery cleaner, and i cannot close the window, it keeps popping up.
i tried downloading and installing mbam, but when i try to open the installer, it won't open.
please help.
also, this comes up when i say no to downloading the program : http://leclean.us/download.php?affid=02944

item.title: Help me, pleasee!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Sounds to me like a smitfraud variant. They are hard to remove.

Try redownloading malware bytes anti malware. Boot into safemode and scan with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me, pleasee!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

It’s obvious the spyware/malware he has on his computer is blocking him from installing anti-virus. So he should just boot into safemode and install AVG, Spybot, and CCleaner from there. If he can’t do that then he needs to just install a fresh copy of windows.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me, pleasee!
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

try downloading and run avast or avg.
or maybe try system recovery?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me, pleasee!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Where did he say he wanted to switch to Linux???

Read full topic

item.title: Help me, pleasee!
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

Elijah:

Backup important files, format your drive, and install Linux.

[center] Don’t spam[/center]

Read full topic
